content: Hi - I'm new to cds-hooks, and am at the connectathon trying this out and really enjoying it. One thing I am interesting in digging into is the security model using SMART and OAuth (I can see security is listed in the stream scenarios) - are there any publicly available endpoints that implement this to try it out?

I am not aware of any yet. I am planning to implement this within my Cerner implementation but I have not been successful in doing any coding today (too many great discussions I've been participating in!)
I have done this in my service and tested it with Allscripts last connectathon. But the new security model defined in the spec as of now is different. So I still need to implement the updates.
